title: Headlight Vertical Adjustment

body.body: Always make sure the handlebars are in the straight ahead position when checking and adjusting the headlight beam setting.

Headlight Vertical Adjustment - D54; D64; D71; D72; D74; D92; DA2; DB; DB2; DB4; DBX; DC; DC3; DC4; DCZ; DD2; DE; DE2; DF; DF2; DF4; DP; DP2; DP3; DP4; DPA; DPZ;  DR4; DS1; DS4; DSA; DSB; DSX; DT3; DT4; DU; DU3; DU4; DUY; DZ; DZA
Switch the headlight dipped beam on.
Loosen the headlight assembly mounting fixings sufficiently to allow restricted movement of the headlight.
Adjust the position of the headlight to give the required beam setting.
Switch the headlight off when the beam setting is satisfactorily set.
